name: Hotel Yak & Yeti
description: A luxury heritage hotel in the heart of Kathmandu, offering traditional Nepalese hospitality with modern amenities. Located near major tourist attractions and perfect for exploring the cultural sites of the valley.

name: Kathmandu Guest House
description: Historic guest house in Thamel, the tourist hub of Kathmandu. Famous for being one of the first hotels to cater to international travelers, offering comfortable rooms and authentic Nepali cuisine.

name: Himalayan Hostel Kathmandu
description: Budget-friendly hostel perfect for backpackers exploring the Kathmandu Valley. Offers dormitory and private rooms with shared facilities, common areas for socializing, and travel assistance.

name: Swayambhu Peace Zone Homestay
description: Traditional Newari homestay near Swayambhunath Temple, offering authentic cultural experiences with local families. Includes home-cooked meals and cultural activities.

name: Boudha Garden Resort
description: Peaceful resort near Boudhanath Stupa, combining modern comfort with Buddhist spirituality. Features garden views, meditation spaces, and easy access to the monastery complex.

name: Heritage Hotel Patan
description: Boutique hotel in the heart of Lalitpur, showcasing traditional Newari architecture. Walking distance to Patan Durbar Square and perfect for exploring the artistic heritage of the city.

name: Patan Community Homestay
description: Authentic Newari homestay experience in the ancient city of Patan. Participate in traditional crafts, enjoy local cuisine, and learn about the rich cultural heritage of the Newar community.

name: Golden Temple Lodge
description: Peaceful lodge near the Golden Temple (Hiranya Varna Mahavihar), offering spiritual accommodation with meditation facilities and vegetarian cuisine.

name: Lalitpur Backpackers Inn
description: Modern hostel in Lalitpur with clean dormitories, private rooms, and rooftop views of the Himalayan range. Great for budget travelers exploring the Kathmandu Valley.

name: Bhaktapur Heritage Hotel
description: Traditional brick and wood hotel in the medieval city of Bhaktapur. Experience the authentic atmosphere of this UNESCO World Heritage site with easy access to temples and squares.

name: Pottery Square Lodge
description: Unique accommodation in Bhaktapur where guests can participate in traditional pottery making. Located in the famous Pottery Square with authentic cultural experiences.

name: Nyatapola View Hotel
description: Charming hotel with views of the famous five-story Nyatapola Temple. Offers comfortable rooms and rooftop dining with panoramic views of Bhaktapur's ancient architecture.

name: Bhaktapur Guest House
description: Traditional guest house offering budget-friendly accommodation in the heart of Bhaktapur. Family-run establishment with home-cooked meals and cultural insights.

name: Lakeside Resort Pokhara
description: Luxury resort on the shores of Phewa Lake with stunning views of the Annapurna range. Features spa services, multiple dining options, and water sports facilities.

name: Himalayan Hotel Pokhara
description: Mid-range hotel in the heart of Lakeside with mountain views and easy access to restaurants, shops, and boat rentals. Perfect base for exploring Pokhara's attractions.

name: Sarangkot Sunrise Lodge
description: Mountain lodge at Sarangkot viewpoint offering spectacular sunrise views over the Himalayas. Popular with trekkers and adventure enthusiasts, includes paragliding packages.

name: Pokhara Peace Hostel
description: Vibrant hostel in Lakeside catering to backpackers and solo travelers. Features common areas, organized activities, and assistance with trekking permits and adventure sports.

name: Gurung Heritage Homestay
description: Traditional Gurung homestay in the hills above Pokhara. Experience authentic mountain culture, participate in farming activities, and enjoy panoramic valley views.

name: World Peace Pagoda Lodge
description: Peaceful lodge near the World Peace Pagoda with meditation facilities and Buddhist teachings. Offers simple accommodation with spiritual focus and mountain views.

name: Chitwan Jungle Resort
description: Luxury eco-resort in the heart of Chitwan National Park offering safari experiences, elephant rides, and jungle walks. All-inclusive packages with guided wildlife tours.

name: Bharatpur Garden Hotel
description: Modern hotel in Bharatpur city center with easy access to Chitwan National Park. Features comfortable rooms, restaurant, and tour arrangements for wildlife activities.

name: Tharu Cultural Lodge
description: Traditional Tharu homestay experience with authentic cultural programs, folk dances, and local cuisine. Learn about the indigenous Tharu community and their customs.

name: Rapti River Lodge
description: Riverside lodge offering boat trips on the Rapti River and wildlife spotting opportunities. Features comfortable accommodation with nature-focused activities.

name: Chitwan Backpackers Hostel
description: Budget-friendly hostel near Chitwan National Park with dormitory accommodation and safari packages. Popular among young travelers and wildlife enthusiasts.

name: Sauraha Elephant Lodge
description: Unique lodge offering elephant interaction experiences and jungle safaris. Family-friendly accommodation with educational programs about wildlife conservation.

name: Riverside Resort Ratnanagar
description: Peaceful resort along the Rapti River with excellent bird watching opportunities and canoe trips. Features comfortable rooms and outdoor dining areas.

name: Tharu Village Homestay
description: Authentic Tharu village homestay experience with traditional mud houses, cultural shows, and local cuisine. Participate in farming activities and learn about Tharu traditions.

name: Jungle Gateway Lodge
description: Eco-friendly lodge at the entrance of Chitwan National Park with wildlife viewing opportunities and nature walks. Sustainable tourism practices and local community involvement.

name: Ratnanagar Budget Inn
description: Simple and clean budget accommodation for travelers exploring Chitwan. Basic facilities with friendly service and tour arrangements for national park visits.

name: Lumbini Sacred Garden Resort
description: Peaceful resort near the birthplace of Buddha with meditation facilities and spiritual programs. Beautiful gardens and proximity to all major Buddhist monasteries.

name: Buddha Maya Hotel
description: Heritage hotel near Maya Devi Temple with traditional architecture and spiritual atmosphere. Offers comfortable rooms and vegetarian dining options.

name: Pilgrims Rest Guesthouse
description: Simple guesthouse catering to pilgrims and spiritual seekers. Basic accommodation with meditation rooms and library focusing on Buddhist teachings.

name: Lumbini International Hostel
description: Modern hostel welcoming international pilgrims and backpackers. Clean dormitories, common areas for cultural exchange, and bicycle rentals for exploring the area.

name: Bandipur Heritage Lodge
description: Traditional Newari architecture lodge in the hilltop town of Bandipur. Stunning mountain views and easy access to hiking trails and cultural sites.

name: Himalayan Panorama Resort
description: Mountain resort with panoramic views of the Himalayas including Dhaulagiri, Annapurna, and Manaslu ranges. Perfect for mountain photography and relaxation.

name: Bandipur Community Homestay
description: Traditional homestay with local Magar families, offering authentic cultural experiences and home-cooked meals. Participate in daily village life and farming activities.

name: Mountain View Guesthouse
description: Simple guesthouse with spectacular mountain views and peaceful atmosphere. Basic but clean accommodation perfect for travelers seeking tranquility.

name: Gorkha Palace Hotel
description: Historic hotel near the ancestral palace of the Shah dynasty. Offers comfortable accommodation with views of the Gorkha Durbar and surrounding hills.

name: Gorkha Heritage Homestay
description: Traditional homestay with Gurung families, offering insights into local culture and history. Participate in cultural activities and enjoy traditional Nepali cuisine.

name: Upallo Durbar Lodge
description: Mountain lodge with hiking access to Gorkha Durbar and surrounding peaks. Simple accommodation with stunning views and peaceful environment.

name: Tansen Darbar Hotel
description: Heritage hotel in the historic hill town of Tansen with views of the Himalayas. Close to Rani Mahal and traditional bazaar, offering cultural immersion.

name: Palpa Heritage Resort
description: Boutique resort showcasing traditional Palpa architecture with modern amenities. Features terraced gardens and panoramic mountain views.

name: Tansen Bazaar Homestay
description: Traditional homestay in the heart of Tansen bazaar, offering authentic local experiences and traditional Newari-style accommodation.

name: Srinagar Hill Lodge
description: Peaceful lodge on Srinagar Hill with sunrise and sunset views over the Himalayas. Perfect for trekkers and photographers seeking mountain vistas.

name: Baglung Mountain Hotel
description: Modern hotel in Baglung with mountain views and easy access to hiking trails. Comfortable accommodation for trekkers heading to Annapurna region.

name: Kalika Temple Lodge
description: Simple lodge near the famous Kalika Temple with spiritual atmosphere and mountain views. Basic accommodation for pilgrims and trekkers.

name: Baglung Riverside Resort
description: Riverside resort along the Kaligandaki River with adventure activities and natural beauty. Features river views and access to suspension bridge.

name: Baglung Trekkers Hostel
description: Budget hostel catering to trekkers and adventure travelers. Clean dormitories and private rooms with trekking information and gear rental services.

name: Kusma Adventure Lodge
description: Thrilling lodge near the famous Kusma bungee jumping site. Offers accommodation for adventure seekers with packages including bungee jumping and swing activities.

name: Gyadi Bridge Resort
description: Unique resort with views of the world's highest suspension bridge. Offers adventure packages and comfortable accommodation for thrill-seekers.

name: Kusma Riverside Camp
description: Adventure camping site along the river with tents and basic facilities. Perfect for adventure enthusiasts seeking outdoor experiences.

name: Om's Home
description: A cozy lodge with mountain views, located near the airport and perfect for pilgrims heading to Muktinath.

name: Hotel Pride and Spa
description: Comfortable rooms with traditional hospitality and a spa, ideal for relaxing after mountain flights.

name: Nilgiri View Homestay
description: Family-run homestay offering authentic Thakali meals and stunning views of the Nilgiri peaks.

name: Dhulikhel Mountain Resort
description: Luxury resort with panoramic views of the Himalayas, perfect for sunrise watching and peaceful getaways.

name: Namobuddha Retreat Center
description: Quiet retreat center close to Namobuddha Monastery, ideal for spiritual travelers and meditation.

name: Peaceful Valley Homestay
description: Charming homestay nestled in the hills of Dhulikhel, offering local meals and village walks.

name: Hotel Himalayan Sunrise
description: Modern hotel with rooftop dining and great access to the Dhulikhel View Tower and cycling routes.

name: Hotel Seti Riverside
description: Hotel with scenic views of the Seti Gandaki Gorge, ideal for nature lovers and quiet stays.

name: Green Valley Homestay
description: Traditional homestay offering nature walks and local cuisine in a peaceful riverside setting.

name: Seti Eco Resort
description: Eco-friendly resort surrounded by lush forest, great for bird watching and relaxation.

name: Beni Riverside Resort
description: Comfortable resort located near the Kali Gandaki river, perfect for trekkers heading to Mustang.

name: Tatopani Trekker’s Inn
description: Simple lodge catering to trekkers visiting the nearby hot springs and Mustang routes.

name: Myagdi Homestay
description: Friendly family-run homestay offering local meals and hot spring experiences.

name: Hotel Nans
description: Modern hotel near Butwal’s city center, ideal for business travelers and tourists.

name: Manimukunda View Resort
description: Hilltop resort offering panoramic views of Butwal and Manimukunda Park.

name: Butwal Backpackers Hostel
description: Budget-friendly hostel for solo travelers and students, close to local sightseeing areas.

name: Hotel Siddhartha
description: One of the top-rated hotels in Nepalgunj with a large garden and fine dining.

name: Bageshwori Guest House
description: Close to Bageshwori Temple, this guest house caters to pilgrims and spiritual travelers.

name: Peace Homestay
description: Quiet family home turned homestay, perfect for relaxed and affordable stays.

name: Hotel CG Retreat
description: Elegant hotel located near the CG Temple, offering great service and a scenic temple view.

name: Gaindakot Hill Resort
description: Resort nestled in the forest trails, ideal for viewpoint hikes and peace seekers.

name: Temple View Homestay
description: Homely stay offering cultural experiences and views of CG Temple from the terrace.

name: Evergreen Hotel
description: Popular hotel in Hetauda with good connectivity and facilities for short business or leisure stays.

name: Martyr’s Garden Resort
description: Scenic resort surrounded by greenery and near the Martyr’s Memorial Park.

name: Hetauda Homestay
description: Friendly homestay near the forest edge, great for morning walks and short hikes.
